sentences.en: a fake 20 dollar bill
sentences.cn: 一张20美元的伪钞

sentences.en: a fake ID card
sentences.cn: 假身份证

sentences.en: After examining this picture, he unexpectedly said it was a fake.
sentences.cn: 他看了之后竟说:“这是张假画. ”

sentences.en: fake fur
sentences.cn: 人造毛皮

sentences.en: He can tell a fake from the original.
sentences.cn: 他能分辨出赝品和真品.

sentences.en: He looked like a postman but he was really a fake.
sentences.cn: 他看上去像个邮递员,但实际上是个骗子.

sentences.en: He warned against a fake detente that would sap resistance to expansionism.
sentences.cn: 他警告我们不要上假缓和的当,以免放松对扩张主义的斗争.

sentences.en: He was taken in by the fake insurance salesman.
sentences.cn: 他上了冒牌保险业务员的当.

sentences.en: How do you know a fake from the original?
sentences.cn: 怎样识别赝品和真品 呢 ?

sentences.en: I gave a fake name.
sentences.cn: 我报了个假名。

sentences.en: It is filled with famous works of art, and every one of them is a fake.
sentences.cn: 这里满是艺术名品，但每一件都是赝品。

sentences.en: Jones can spot a fake from 20 feet away.
sentences.cn: 琼斯在20英尺开外就能认出假货。

sentences.en: On closer examination the painting proved to be a fake.
sentences.cn: 再经仔细观察,证实那幅画是赝品.

sentences.en: She fake illness so as not to go to school.
sentences.cn: 她为了逃学佯装生病。

sentences.en: She faked her father’s signature on the cheque.
sentences.cn: 她在支票上伪造了其父的签名。

sentences.en: The bank manager is said to have issued fake certificates.
sentences.cn: 据说那个银行经理曾出具伪造的凭证。

sentences.en: The fight he had tried to fake had gone out of him.
sentences.cn: 开始时他那种竭力想诡辩的劲头不知那里去了.

sentences.en: The insurance company suspected that he had faked his own death.
sentences.cn: 保险公司怀疑他制造了自己死亡的假象。

sentences.en: The painting was judged a fake.
sentences.cn: 这幅画被鉴定为赝品。

sentences.en: The results of the experiments were faked.
sentences.cn: 这些实验的结果都是伪造出来的。

sentences.en: Their scam was selling fake Chinese medicine to old people.
sentences.cn: 他们的骗局是卖假中药给老人.

sentences.en: These are fake diamonds.
sentences.cn: 这些是假钻石.

sentences.en: They said, after digging around, the photo was a fake.
sentences.cn: 在搜集了有关情况后，他们说照片是伪造的。

sentences.en: We thought it was a genuine antique, but it turned out to be a fake.
sentences.cn: 我们以为这是真古董, 结果只是一件赝品.

words.tran_cn: 摊贩；骗子；伪造者，伪装者

phrases.tran_cn: 人造革；假裘皮；仿造皮毛

trans.tran_en: not real and seeming to be something it is not, in order to deceive people
a copy of a valuable object, painting etc that is intended to deceive people
to make something seem real in order to deceive people

trans.tran_cn: 伪造， 捏造； 伪装
trans.tran_en: to make something seem real in order to deceive people
